SubSections.Title: Axe Cleave
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Title: Sundering Split

Parts: After you hit an axe attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes sundered for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Whirlwind
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within reach.

SubSections.Title: Ultra Whirlwind
SubSections.Content: After 1 round, you strike all combatants within 8 meters.

SubSections.Title: Tornado
SubSections.Content: At the start of your turns, you attack all combatants within reach. You become slowed 2 until you use a free action to lose it, which ends this ability.

SubSections.Title: Barrage
SubSections.Content: Choose a basic axe attack ability. Over the course of the turn, you use the ability up to 3 times against different combatants.

SubSections.Title: Charge
SubSections.Content: You move up to [Speed*2] meters in a direction of your choice. You gain 1 momentum for every 8 meters moved, up to a maximum of T2. At the end of the movement, you use a basic axe attack ability against a combatant within reach that is in front of you relative to your movement. The damage is increased by [momentum]d6.

SubSections.Title: Retaliate

Parts: You are hit by a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic axe melee attack ability against it. The damage is increased by T1d6.

SubSections.Title: Throw Axe
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Reckless Counter

Parts: You are hit by a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic melee axe attack ability against it. The severity of all applied conditions is increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Force Through

Parts: You miss a combatant with an axe attack.

SubSections.Content: The attack gains advantage against the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Brutal Chop

Parts: After you hit an axe attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 3 bleeding stacks, or 5 on a crit.

SubSections.Title: Blowgun Shot
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Poison Dart

Parts: After you hit a blowgun attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Phasing Dart
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. You attack all combatants in a 2 meters wide ray from you to a point within range. The severity of all applied conditions is increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Numbing Dart

Parts: After you hit a blowgun attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes slowed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Paralyzing Dart

Parts: After you hit a blowgun attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes paralyzed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Sleeping Dart

Parts: After you hit a blowgun attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes collapsed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Pained Counter

Parts: Before a combatant takes damage from your condition.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic blowgun attack ability against it. On a hit, the severity of the condition is increased by 1 for 1 turn.

SubSections.Title: Absorption Reprisal

Parts: After a combatant applies a condition to you.

SubSections.Content: You lose the condition. For 1 round, your next hit against a combatant applies the condition for the same duration.

SubSections.Title: Resilient Coating

Parts: After a combatant gains a condition for a duration from you.

SubSections.Content: The duration is doubled.

SubSections.Title: Slow Onset

Parts: You hit a combatant with a blowgun attack.

SubSections.Content: The combatant does not receive any damage, nor any applied conditions. After 2 rounds, the combatant receives all the damage and conditions. The severity of the conditions is increased by 1.

SubSections.Title: Antidote
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain poisoned, paralyzed, and collapsed immunity.

SubSections.Title: Bow Shot
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Crooked Arrow

Parts: After you hit a bow attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 3 bleeding stacks, or 5 on a crit.

SubSections.Title: Wounding Shot

Parts: After you hit a bow attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes vulnerable for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Triple Shot
SubSections.Content: You attack up to 3 combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Arrow Rain
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. At the start of your turns, you attack all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Volley
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, you attack all combatants within 8 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Recurring Shot
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, whenever a combatant first (per round) is within a 2 meters wide ray from you to the point, you strike it. If your location changes, this ability ends.

SubSections.Title: Overdraw

Parts: Before you make a ranged bow attack.

SubSections.Content: The range of the attack is increased by 30 meters.

SubSections.Title: Draw Bow
SubSections.Content: After a combatant first enters your range, you attack it. Moving interrupts this ability.

SubSections.Title: Deflecting Arrow

Parts: Before a combatant uses a projectile based attack (as determined by the GM).

SubSections.Content: The attack gains disadvantage.

SubSections.Title: Breathless Draw
SubSections.Content: You become zealous for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Cannon Shot
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Belly Shot

Parts: After you hit a cannon attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You push the combatant up to 4 meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Mortar
SubSections.Content: You summon a mortar at an empty point within range that activates after 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Shoot
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. You attack a combatant within 4 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Bombardment
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. At the start of your turns, you strike all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Giant Cannonball
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. You attack all combatants within 4 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Humongous Cannonball
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, you strike all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Debilitating Shot

Parts: After you hit a cannon attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes slowed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Head Cannon

Parts: After you hit a cannon attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes collapsed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Squash

Parts: After you hit a cannon attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes prone.

SubSections.Title: Point Blank Shot

Parts: Before a combatant enters your reach.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic cannon attack ability against it. On a hit, it is pushed 2 meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Unstable Cannonball
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. You attack all combatants within 4 meters of the point. After 1 round, you strike all combatants within 8 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Downwards Shot
SubSections.Content: The area within 8 meters becomes difficult terrain.

SubSections.Title: Humanoid Bullet

Parts: Move Action + Action + Action + Quick Action

SubSections.Content: Choose an empty point within range and a willing combatant within reach. The combatant is pushed through the air to the point. You attack all combatants within 4 meters, except for the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Chain Slash
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Title: Spiked Chains

Parts: After you hit a chains attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 3 bleeding stacks, or 5 on a crit.

SubSections.Title: Whirling Chains
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within reach.

SubSections.Title: Prison
SubSections.Content: Whenever a combatant within reach first (per round) moves away from you, you strike it. Moving interrupts this ability.

SubSections.Title: Infernal Chains (Example Mutation)
SubSections.Content: Whenever a combatant within reach first (per round) moves away from you, you strike it. Moving interrupts this ability.

SubSections.Title: Pull Chain

Parts: After you hit a chains attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You pull the combatant up to 4 meters towards you.

SubSections.Title: Chain Bind

Parts: After you hit a chains attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes grappled.

SubSections.Title: Entangling Chains

Parts: After you are attacked by a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes grappled.

SubSections.Title: Pull Leg

Parts: After you hit a chains attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes prone.

SubSections.Title: Neckbind
SubSections.Content: After the combatant first moves, you attack it. If the combatant teleports, this ability is interrupted.

SubSections.Title: Chain Sweep
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a 8 meters half circle.

SubSections.Title: Whirling Toss
SubSections.Content: Choose an empty point within range and a willing combatant besides you within reach. The combatant is pushed through the air to the point.

SubSections.Title: Scratch
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Title: Brutal Scratch

Parts: After you hit a claw attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 3 bleeding stacks, or 5 on a crit.

SubSections.Title: Flurry Of Claws
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant and a basic claw attack ability. You use the ability 3 times against it. The accuracy of the attacks is decreased by 5.

SubSections.Title: Uncontrolled Frenzy
SubSections.Content: Choose a basic claw attack ability. Over the course of the turn, you use the ability up to 3 times against different combatants.

SubSections.Title: Quick Claw
SubSections.Content: You use a basic claw attack ability against it. You apply 1 additional stack of each stackable condition that you apply.

SubSections.Title: Predatory Reflexes
SubSections.Content: You become protected 2 against the attack.

SubSections.Title: Moving Claw
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. You attack all combatants within a 6 meters wide ray from you to the point.

SubSections.Title: Divergent Claw
SubSections.Content: Choose 3 points within a [Range] meters cone. You attack all combatants within 2 meters wide rays from you to each of the points.

SubSections.Title: Brutal Scratch

Parts: After you hit a claw attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes grappled while within reach.

SubSections.Title: Tear Apart

Parts: You hit a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Content: After 1 round, you attack the combatant twice. If the combatant stops being within reach, this ability is interrupted.

SubSections.Title: Brutal Scar

Parts: After you hit a claw attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes scarred for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Relentless Chase
SubSections.Content: You become hastened for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Focused Frenzy
SubSections.Content: You become focused 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Crossbow Shot
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Nasty Bolt

Parts: After you hit a crossbow attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes vulnerable for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Piercing Shot

Parts: After you hit a crossbow attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes sundered for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Rapid Fire
SubSections.Content: You attack up to 3 combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Heavy Bolt

Parts: After you hit a crossbow attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You push the combatant 2 meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Splitting Bolt
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range. On a hit, you target up to 3 additional combatants within a [Range] meters cone behind the hit combatant.

SubSections.Title: Limited Auto Fire
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant and a basic crossbow attack ability. You use the ability 3 times against it. The accuracy of the attacks is decreased by 5.

SubSections.Title: Oversized Bolt
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Loaded Shot
SubSections.Content: After 2 rounds, you can use a quick action to attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Quick Reload

Parts: After you miss a crossbow attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic crossbow attack ability against the combatant. You gain disadvantage on the attack.

SubSections.Title: Leg Shot

Parts: After you hit a crossbow attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes slowed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Cudgel Smash
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Title: Push Away

Parts: After you hit a cudgel attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You push the combatant 2 meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Spinning Shield
SubSections.Content: For 1 round, all projectile based attacks gain disadvantage against you. What specific attacks count is up to the GM.

SubSections.Title: Hand Spin
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within reach.

SubSections.Title: Extend Staff
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Flowing Staff
SubSections.Content: You become protected and slowed until the ability ends. After each time a combatant within reach attacks, you strike the combatant. At the start of your turns, you can choose to end this ability.

SubSections.Title: Staff Acrobatics
SubSections.Content: For 1 round, all attacks gain disadvantage against you.

SubSections.Title: Knock Head

Parts: After you hit a cudgel attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes confused for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Heavy Cudgel
SubSections.Content: You become strengthened for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Pole Vault
SubSections.Content: You jump [Speed*2] meters into a direction of your choice. You can use a basic cudgel attack.

SubSections.Title: Charge Staff
SubSections.Content: Choose a simple melee cudgel attack ability. You become resilient for 1 round. After 1 round, you use the ability. Its attack gains advantage and all combatants become sundered against it.
